title: fuck rito
body: I constantly see  toxic midges and flamers playing and all and not getting banned no matter how much they flame and how many games they ruin but when I decided to fight back I got permanently suspended lol rito idk if theres a dumber staff in any game but u guys are literally braindead I mean tf is wrong with u people are tryna have fun and when someone is trying to prevent em from it without a logical reason they get banned just cuz theyve let emotions control them for a bit? :D what do you freakin think we are? robots? :D u are funny tho cuz u think u are making the community better and the game itself but imma tell u something ive been playin league for 6 years now and i can deffinitely tell you that all youve done is aggravate things and thats the funniest part cuz mostly whats left in this shitass game is a bunch of r%%%%%ed 12-year-old midgets whose only way of feeling powerful and mighty is clicking the report button and those same kids one day will grow up and maybe some of them are going to take ur place and thats the funniest part cuz I bet that u guys dont rly give a shit bout league community. Its all a matter of money

replies.body:
While Necromancy may be handy (and sometimes needed) in video games, it's not the case for old forum threads. Please avoid using such magic and be mindful of how old threads are before posting.

Feel free to contact us at the [Moderation Discord](https://discordapp.com/channels/230113905668653056/306220435262144512) or at [Discuss the Boards]( https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/community-moderation) for any questions, comments or concerns about this. Thank you and have a good day.
you guys didnt see eune server mate
I can see why you got banned. Have a good day sir, hope you manage to get better :)
just because you don't see the system working doesn't mean the system isn't working.
i mean, you're a flamer and you got banned so...
inb4 we get 100 people posting chatlogs a day
